org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows

Class SettingsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows.SettingsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    class SettingsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class is the JPanel for the settings selection by the user. In this panel, the user can select the settings they wish to change. When they press a button to save the changes, the changes are collected and serialized to disk.

    The SettingsPanel class was created in order to reduce the amount of times the entire settings JPanel needs to be written.

    Since:
    2018-12-26, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins
